switch.name: rejected takeoff
switch.test: fcs/flap-pos-deg gt 10 fcs/flap-pos-deg lt 30 fcs/revers-on-ground gt 0

switch.name: normal landing
switch.test: fcs/flap-pos-deg gt 30 fcs/revers-on-ground gt 0.5 fcs/throttle-cmd-norm[0] lt fcs/revers-1-limit fcs/throttle-cmd-norm[1] lt fcs/revers-1-limit fcs/throttle-cmd-norm[2] lt fcs/revers-1-limit fcs/throttle-cmd-norm[0] gt fcs/revers-2-limit fcs/throttle-cmd-norm[1] gt fcs/revers-2-limit fcs/throttle-cmd-norm[2] gt fcs/revers-2-limit

function.name: aero/coefficient/Cstab
function.description: Pitch moment due to stabilizer position

table.name: Yaw moment due flaps and Mach
